title: Plan weekend activities
text: Make plans for hiking and picnics with friends and family.

title: Prepare presentation
text: Gather data and create slides for the upcoming presentation.

title: Birthday gift ideas
text: Research gift options for a friend's birthday celebration.

title: Study for exams
text: Review notes and textbooks for the upcoming exams.

title: Renew library books
text: Check due dates and renew books borrowed from the library.
